item.title: Laptop Too Big? Try a Tablet
item.description: Carrying a laptop everywhere would be great if it wasn’t so heavy and cumbersome. While internet-enabled phones address the size issue, their small buttons and screens can be limiting. Ideally, there’s a middle groundâ€”something portable yet equipped for easy internet browsing. This is where internet media tablets come in. The Archos 7, for example, is a top-tier ultra-mobile computer resembling a larger iPhone, with a 7-inch touchscreen offering an 800x480 pixel resolution.
